entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is an elf who still thinks Mr. Crouch is her master.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is a person who has stopped turning up to judge the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is mentioned as Winky's new master.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a person who talks to Winky and asks her about Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a person who quickly corrects Harry's statement that Mr. Crouch is ill.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as reporting that Mr. Crouch is ill.

entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is an event where Mr. Crouch was supposed to be a judge.

relationships.description: Winky still thinks Mr. Crouch is her master.
Harry talks to Winky and asks her about Mr. Crouch.
Hermione mentions that they are not sure if Mr. Crouch is ill.
The Daily Prophet reports on Mr. Crouch's supposed illness.
Winky is mentioned as Professor Dumbledore's new elf.
